from core.chatbot import PharmacySalesChatbot
from api.integration import PharmacyAPIClient

# Test API client
try:
    with PharmacyAPIClient() as api:
        pharmacies = api.get_all_pharmacies()
        print(f''‚úÖ API Client: Retrieved {len(pharmacies)} pharmacies'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''‚ùå API Client failed: {e}'')

# Test chatbot basic functionality  
try:
    with PharmacySalesChatbot(enable_debug=False) as bot:
        greeting = bot.start_conversation(''+1-555-123-4567'')
        print(f''‚úÖ Chatbot: Generated greeting of {len(greeting)} characters'')
        
        summary = bot.get_conversation_summary()
        print(f''‚úÖ Chatbot: Summary generated with {summary[""message_count""]} messages'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''‚ùå Chatbot failed: {e}'')

print(''‚úÖ File organization and imports are working correctly!'')
")
